Text: In the Battle of the Bowling Alley (August 12–25, 1950), United Nations (UN) forces defeated North Korean forces early in the Korean War near the city of Taegu, South Korea.
Triplets:<In the Battle of the Bowling Alley
1:
--------------------
Text: Battle of the Bowling Alley:  The battle took place in a narrow valley, dubbed the "Bowling Alley", which was north of Taegu.
Triplets:<Battle of the Bowling Alley

<Text: Battle of the Bowling Alley:  Reinforcements, including the US Army's 27th and 23rd Infantry Regiments were committed to bolster the South Koreans' defenses.>
